DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate efficacy safety benzocaine gel product relief toothache ass subject 's compliance propose label direction .
DOC.criteria: Males female least 12 year age . Presence spontaneous toothache pain one permanent tooth . Toothache pain due open tooth cavity result dental caries , loss restoration tooth fracture . To qualify study , subject must rating least moderate pain Dental Pain Scale ( DPS ) score least 50 mm Visual Analog Scale . To include moderate pain stratum , subject must rating moderate pain DPS include severe pain stratum subject must rating severe pain DPS . Females neither pregnant , verify urinebased pregnancy test , breastfeed . Female subject childbearing potential postmenopausal le 2 year must use medically approve method contraception ( i.e. , oral , transdermal implant contraceptive device , intrauterine device , diaphragm , condom , abstinence , surgical sterility ) . Subjects must reliable , cooperative adequate intelligence read understand rating scale study instruction . Subjects must able read , comprehend , sign consent form . Minors provide assent study participation age appropriate . Parent/legal guardian must able read , comprehend , sign inform consent form . Presence spontaneous toothache pain primary tooth . Presence spontaneous toothache pain one tooth . Presence open tooth cavity tooth adjacent painful tooth open tooth cavity . Presence concomitant oral pain due condition : softtissue lesion ( e.g. , aphthous traumatic ulcer , herpes labialis , acute necrotizing ulcerative gingivitis ) ; multiple hardtissue ( e.g. , carious ) lesion ; pain due surgical procedure , injury dental surface sensitivity . Presence periodontal abscess diagnose Xray clinical examination painful tooth . Presence glucose6phosphate dehydrogenase ( G6PD ) deficiency . History acute chronic hemolytic anemia . History sensitivity allergy benzocaine local anesthetic agent . Use shortacting oral topical analgesic/ anesthetic product within 2 hour enrollment longacting Rx OTC analgesic product within 4 hour enrollment . Use investigational drug participation investigational study within past 30 day . Previous participation study . Member relative study site staff sponsor directly involve study .
